rukus.text: 26|176|Mori no hitobito mo shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita.
26|177|Shuaibu ga kare-ra ni,`anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai.
26|178|Kare (shuaibu) wa itta. `Hontōni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|179|Dakara arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|180|Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hōshū o motomenai. Watashi e no hōshū wa, ii ban'yū no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|181|Keiryō o jūbun ni atae, son o sa sete wa narimasen.
26|183|tanin no mono o sashu shite wa narimasen. Mata meiwaku o oyobosu okonai o shite, chijō o taihai sa sete wa narimasen.
26|184|Anata gata to mae no sedai no mono-tachi o tsukura reta kata, kare o osore nasai.'
26|185|Suru to kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa tsuka reta mono ni sugimasen.
26|186|Anata wa watashi-tachi to onaji hitori no ningen ni sugimasen. Dō kangaete mo anata wa kyogen no todesu.
26|187|Anata no iu koto ga shinjitsunara, ten'noikkaku o watashi-tachi no ue ni otoshi nasai.'
26|188|Kare (shuaibu) wa itta. `Watashi no omo wa, anata gata no suru koto o yoku shitte ora remasu.'
26|189|Daga kare-ra wa kare o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Sorede ano insan'na hi no chōbatsu ga kare-ra o osotta. Sore wa hontōni kibishī chōbatsu no hideatta.
26|190|Hontōni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|191|Hontōni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru.
